title: User Guide
subtitle: How to use InterTrader
body: InterTrader is designed to help you take advantage of the price variations between exchanges. This is a quick start guide with purely the essentials for you to use the app. ## Getting started ### Get the app If you haven't already, download and install the app from [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=club.lambomoon.cec). ### Find some coins When InterTrader starts you'll be on the _Favourites_ page. This list will be empty, so start by tapping the _`Find some coins`_ button . ![Start page](/gin-data/images/1527767084077-start-page.png) ### Browse or search Tap the exchange you'd like to browse. If looking for a specific coin, tap the search icon in the top right corner and start typing out the _symbol_. ![Exchanges](/gin-data/images/1527767569202-exchange-list.png) ### Find your coin Browse the list of coins and find the pairing you're interested in. Where possible, InterTrader displays the name of the coins in the pair, as well as the ticker symbols, making it easier to differentiate between coins that share the same symbol. You can also add pairs directly to your _Favourites_ by tapping the star in the list. ![Find your coin](/gin-data/images/1527769043366-coin-list.png) ### Compare prices Tap your preferred coin and you'll be taken to a screen similar to the one below. ![Compare prices](/gin-data/images/1527769278878-compare-coins.png) This quick summary of the what the icons do. For a more detailed guide to this page, visit the comparison page guide. * View inter-exchange stats about the coin pair * Add the coin pair to your favourites * View the pair's orderbook for that exchange {{list type=page}}
